code:
function performRequest(request,callback){fetch(request).then(function(response){if(response.ok){response.json().then(json=>callback(json,response.status,null));}else{response.json().then(err=>callback(null,response.status,err));}}).catch(function(err){//catch any other unexpected error, and set custom code for error = 1
callback(null,1,err);});}module.exports={performRequest};
